channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gladiator and The Renegade
channel.description:
We could really use another Blue Dragon Offensive class, and I though reworking NuclearBurrito's [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-duelist-gladiator/39463?u=orangeandblack5]Duelist and Gladiator[/url] could be a good way to go about it.
--- > <big>**[color=steblue]The Gladiator[/color]**</big> >**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Offensive[/color]** > >**Competitive (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. However, you can never be made immune to conversion. >**Last Stand (Passive)** - If you are the last Blue Dragon, you gain an additional use of Riposte. Additionally, Riposte will kill its target. > >**Challenge (Day)** - Resets all votes. Only you or your target may be voted for the rest of the day. *(1 use)* > >**Parry (Night)** - If your target visits you, remove their immunities and redirect them to themselves. Every successful use of this ability gives you an additional use of Riposte. *(Infinite uses)* **Riposte (Night)** - Disable your target's passives, and remove their immunities to take them for yourself. This will last for two nights (including this night). *(1 use)* > >_Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any Neutrals that seek to do you harm._
>**Converts into [color=purple]The Renegade[/color].** --- ><big>**[color=purple]The Renegade[/color]**</big> >**[color=purple]Unseen Offensive[/color]** > >**Illicit (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. >**Berserk (Passive)** - If the Mastermind is dead, Lunge gains unlimited uses and will occupy its target. > >**Feint (Day)** - Resets all votes. Only you or your target may be voted for the rest of the day. *(1 use)* > >**Second Intention (Night)** - If your target visits you, remove their immunities for two nights (including tonight) and redirect them to themselves. Every successful use of this ability gives you an additional use of Lunge. *(Infinite uses)* **Lunge (Night)** - Disable your target's passives and remove their immunities. This will last for two nights (including this night). The number of uses this has will be the number of uses of Riposte you had before being converted plus one. > >_Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you._ --- These classes have high skill ceilings, requiring players that want to get the most out of them to either predict who will visit them or to bait specific players into doing so. As such, they play out very differently from the other Blue Dragon Offensive classes, but fill a similar role, inhibiting the ability of the evil classes to act freely.

Challenge (Day) - Resets all votes. Only you or your target may be voted for the rest of the day. (1 use)

Seems like an ability that’s so confirmable it should only be on the King

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gladiator and The Renegade
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
RHCube:

Since you could technically just keep gaining uses of this I don’t think you should start out with one use

While that is fair, I would like to give players who fail to parry some utility

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gladiator and The Renegade
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
RHCube:

Question: When you take them for yourself, will you take them permanently or just as long as they are disabled?

As long as they are disabled.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Gladiator and The Renegade

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gladiator and The Renegade
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

Disable your target’s passives, and remove their immunities to take them for yourself.

Question: When you take them for yourself, will you take them permanently or just as long as they are disabled?

orangeandblack5:

Riposte (Night) - Disable your target’s passives, and remove their immunities to take them for yourself. This will last for two nights (including this night). (1 use)

Since you could technically just keep gaining uses of this I don’t think you should start out with one use

orangeandblack5:

Feint (Day) - Resets all votes. Only you or your target may be voted for the rest of the day. (1 use)

Is the name change necessary?

Everything else is good.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Gladiator and The Renegade
